canOfHamms.name: CAN OF HAMM'S
canOfHamms.description: A warm can of beer. Delicious..? +1 LOAD, +5 HP

cupOfLean.name: CUP OF LEAN
cupOfLean.description: A crusty styrofoam cup filled with a strange purple syrup. +1.2 LOAD, +20 HP

glassOfToiletWater.name: GLASS OF TOILET WATER
glassOfToiletWater.description: A glass filled to the rim with toilet water, extracted from the toilet bowl belonging to a Keeper. The glass has a rather badass sticker of a skeleton riding a motorcycle neatly applied...  +1.2 LOAD, +50 HP

alaskaRaisins.name: ALASKA RAISINS
alaskaRaisins.description: Holy shit! It's the Alaska Raisins! +1.5 LOAD, +70 HP

dowsingRod.name: DOWSING ROD
dowsingRod.description: A Y-shaped stick. Reveals the exit of the current floor. +1.7 LOAD

torch.name: TORCH
torch.description: An unlit torch. Using it will reveal the map of the current floor. +1.2 LOAD

brickOfC4.name: BRICK OF C-4
brickOfC4.description: An incendiary plastic explosive. Great for turning anything into nothing real quick! +3 LOAD

tromBone.name: TROM-BONE
tromBone.description: A trom-BONE. It sounds like a trombone, looks like a trombone, but is somehow... on the bonier side of things. +1.3 LOAD
